result.execSummary:
The defendant Cody K. Bolt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Trespass to Dwelling, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.14.
  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: from JA directing payment of attorney fees

11:38 am - Defendant Cody K. Bolt in court with attorney Patrick Howard Finlan.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State amends Count 1 to Creiminal Tresspass a Class A Misdemeanor -943.14 - Granted.  Defendant pleads no contest.  Plea questionnaire filed.    Court reads on waiver of rights and tendering plea. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that a factual basis for the plea exists and finds defendant guilty.  Michlig/Finlan/Defendant/Court statement to sentencing.
Court Sentence - Each Count Concurrent
Jail 150 days  W/Huber for all purposes - Jail credit 1 day - To commence on/before 5-8-15 at 8 am
CC/DNA Surcharge (1 ct only)/Supervision Fees
Attorney fees to be taken first prior to court costs 
Appeal rights given

Court statement to defendant not making his court appt monthly payments -  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 28, 2015 at 11:30 am.
from JA directing payment of attorney fees

11:36 am - Defendant Cody K. Bolt in court with attorney Patrick Howard Finlan.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives preliminary hearing. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that probable cause exists and binds over.  State files Information.  Finlan in receipt of Information, waives reading and enters not guilty pleas.  Court reminds defendant to start making attorney fee payments.  Bail continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 3, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

02:40 pm - Defendant Cody K. Bolt in court with attorney Patrick Howard Finlan.  Michael W. Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  In receipt of complaint, waive reading -set for preliminary hearing - Time limits waived
Bail continued  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 7, 2015 at 11:30 am.
States Reply to Discovery  and State's Demand for Discovery
from JA appointing Finlan and setting payment plan of $100/month

records.addlTxt: 01:59 pm - Defendant Cody K. Bolt in court.  Jodie L. Bednar appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court questions defendant as to contact with PD.  Defendant met with PD and was found ineligible.  Defendant files PFAC with Court.  Court will appoint counsel - Pat Finlan.  Bail continued.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for December 1, 2014 at 02:30 pm.
